name: Memotech MTX Series Games Collection Vol.2
overview: Claus Bækkel of www.mtxworld.dk offers here conversions of three MTX games. In Nemo you must shoot the descending sharks before they eat you. Find the Power Box to escape from the monsters in the game Obloids. In Astro-Pac The Lost Levels you have to retrieve the parts of your spaceship to fly away.
